user.title: Connect to Homematic IP HCU
user.description: Please enter the IP address of your Home Control Unit (HCU).

auth.title: Authorize Integration
auth.description:
Please follow these steps on your HCU's web interface (likely at `https://192.168.178.53`):

1. Navigate to **Developer Mode**.
2. Press the **Generate activation key** button.
3. Enter the temporary key below.

![HCU Activation Key Location](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ediminator/hacs-homematicip-hcu/main/images/hcu_activation_key.png)
